name: Post Author Switcher
author: Geek Code Lab

sections.description:
If you want to change the author of multiple posts simultaneously, then this plugin is for you.

By using this plugin you can easily change multiple posts author to new post author. Additionally you can switch post author by post type, post status and existing post author.

How to use the plugin?

To bulk update authors, you should first navigate to the ‚ÄúPost Author Switcher‚Äù page from the WordPress admin sidebar.

Next, you need to select the post type, post status and existing selected author of posts which you want to change the author.

After that, you need select new author you want to assign. That‚Äôs it now click on ‚ÄúRun Author Switcher‚Äù button. Selected posts author will be changed.

You can also switch post author from user edit screen. To do that go to that user edit page which user you want to change with new post author.

Free Features
üîπ Easy to configure
üîπ Switch author by post type
üîπ Switch author by post status
üîπ Switch author from existing selected post author
üîπ Directly switch the posts author from user edit screen
üîπ Plugin designed to address challenges in WordPress
üîπ Simplifies author management with a single-click solution
üîπ Fast user switching experience
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

This is the easiest way to install the plugin on your WordPress website. For installing our plugin you need to login to your WordPress dashboard. Now go to the Plugins menu then click on the Add New option.

After this, you will get a new window, here in the search box enter our plugin name Post Author Switcher. Now from the list, you can find our plugin and simply click on the Install button.

Admin Dashboard > Plugins > Add New > Search for Post Author Switcher plugin.

Manual Installation

For manual installation, the first step is you need to download the plugin. Extract the .zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the plugin from the Plugins page.

After activating the plugin, go to Admin Dashboard -> Post Author Switcher and start plugin configuration to Switch Post Authors.
